questions.question: I really feel that we should give him the ........................................ of doubt.
Susie was upset with Michael and gave him the cold ........................................ when she met him at the party.
I wanted to give my parents a surprise gift on their wedding anniversary, but my sister unwittingly gave the ............................................... away.
My parents have given me the .................................................... light to join the local soccer team.
My sister gave me the ................................................. eye when I told our parents that she had let the cat in.
